notification_message_naked_link.message:
The link of $image$ rehosted on $host$
has been pasted to the clipboard.
notification_message_naked_link.description: Message for the notification saying which kind of rehosting has been pasted to the clipboard.

notification_message_naked_link_without_.message:
The link of the image without rehosting
has been pasted to the clipboard.
notification_message_naked_link_without_.description: Message for the notification saying which kind of rehosting has been pasted to the clipboard.

notification_message_bbcode_without_link.message:

has been pasted to the clipboard.
